property.name: Description
property.definition: A textual description of the preparation.

property.name: RingersSolution
property.definition: The Ringer solution used during preparation.

property.name: SlicingMethod
property.definition: How was the brain sliced: Microtome etc.

property.name: SliceOrientation
property.definition: The slice orientation: horizontal, sagital etc.

property.name: BathSolution
property.definition: The solution the slice is bathed in.

property.name: SolutionFlowSpeed
property.definition: The flow speed of the bath solution.

property.name: BathTemperature
property.definition: The temperature of the bath solution.

property.name: Anaestesia
property.definition: Is the animal under anaesthesia (true) or awake (false)?

property.name: AnaestheticDose
property.definition: The dose of the used anaesthetic.

property.name: LocalAnaesthesia
property.definition: Was there some local anaesthesia applied (true or false).

property.name: LocalAnaesthetic
property.definition: The drug that was used for local anaesthesia.

property.name: LocalAnaestheticDose
property.definition: The dose of the used local anaesthetic.

property.name: LocalAnaestheticLocation
property.definition: Describes the place the local anaesthetic was applied.
